feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for Artisan call in SelfUpdater
  • Fixes for recurring invoice and reminder sent notifications.
  • v5.11.30 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10588

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.29...v5.11.30

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for composer lock file.
  • v5.11.31 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10589

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.30...v5.11.31

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.32
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for BTC Pay webhooks
  • Add + to allowed markdown
  • Fixes for returning early from TaskRepository
  • Fixes for sorting columns
  • v5.11.32 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10592

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.31...v5.11.32

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.33
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for markdown resolution
  • Refactored for a single transaction when deleting an invoice.
  • Update default payment method if current is deleted.
  • Checks for migrations
  • Updated lock file for dependencies.
  • v5.11.33 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.32...v5.11.33

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.34
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for recurring due dates
  • Adjustments for the elegant design
  • Adjustments for last login
  • Fixes for recurring invoice filters
  • Add checks for job_batches
  • Update dependencies for Braintree
  • Add no overflow when calculating due dates in recurring dates tests
  • v5.11.34 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.33...v5.11.34
